landing.heroSubtitle: Experience the future of conversation with multiple AI models
landing.featuresDescription: Discover powerful features designed to enhance your AI conversation experience
landing.feature1Desc: Choose from three powerful AI models for your conversations
landing.feature2Desc: Full support for English and Arabic with RTL layout
landing.feature3Desc: Save and revisit all your previous conversations
landing.feature4Desc: Get instant responses powered by advanced AI technology
landing.feature5Desc: Your conversations are private and protected
landing.feature6Desc: AI-generated profile summaries for personalized experiences
landing.aboutDesc: Our AI chatbot provides intelligent responses using state-of-the-art language models.
landing.footerText1: Our platform integrates cutting-edge AI models to provide you with intelligent, context-aware responses.Whether you are seeking information, creative inspiration, or technical assistance, our chatbot adapts to your needs.
landing.footerText2: Built with modern technologies, our application ensures a smooth, responsive experience across all devices. Your chat history is securely stored, and our AI generates personalized summaries to guide your future interactions

profile.title: User Profile
profile.noSummary: No summary generated yet. Start chatting to generate your profile summary!
